LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_ConfigMissingProjec: No projectile defined in ordnance properties for OrdnanceDef {0}
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignateArtilleryD: Designate a target for an artillery strike from local defense network ordnance.\n\nRight click to select ordnance type.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorNotDrafte: Must be drafted to be used.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorNotConnec: Cannot find a local defense grid to connect to.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorNoOrdnanc: Local defense grids do not have any loaded ordnance.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorNoPawnDes: Cannot designate artillery strikes without a manned console or field designator.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorErrorAnti: Anti-tank ordnance can only lock onto targets of sufficient size or density.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorErrorSens: Target is outside of sensor tower range.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorCannotCon: Error: Unable to connect to defense grid network, please try again.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorEmptyOrdn: Error: Selected ordnance type is empty.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorOrdnanceU: Error: Selected ordnance type is unavailable.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorInvalidCa: Error: Invalid pawn attempted to designate target.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorCooldownA: Error: Selected launcher is on cooldown.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignatorNoneAvail: Error: No launchers were able to fire.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_NetworkNoOrdnanceDe: Selected defense grid does not have any loaded ordnance.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignationModeSing: Launches a single round of the selected type from the nearest available launcher.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignationModeClus: Launches all ordnance from the selected launcher.
LanguageData.EccentricDefenseGrid_DesignationModeVoll: Launches a round of the selected type from all available launchers.
